ratings.comment: I'm not a math/stats person but this ended up being one of my favorite classes.  He's super nice and down to earth, and it's clear that his main goal is to make sure everyone understands the material.  There's hw every week but it's mostly previous exam questions which is actually really helpful, and in discussions my TA went through it with us

class was way more interesting than i expected but was still kind of boring.  he tries to make it interesting and is willing to help you after class. why do you ask if he is hot?  that seems weird. anyway i would take him again.
really sucky material but well taught  he is a good dude and tries to explain and is fair  he kind of looks like a crazy professor
He was the worst professor I've ever had.  His class is the only class I have every gotten a C in.  I went in for help early on and he told me there was nothing he could do for me

Extremely nice and approachable guy. Makes stats as painless as it can be. My TA was terrible, but he's willing to help and is reasonable regarding grading. Weekly homework, but he uses old exam questions, so you have a really good idea of what he expects on exams. I hate stats, but he's one of my favorite professors I've had.

Really nice guy and always willing to help.  Goes very slow in class, only hard part is to keep yourself to pay attention. Just be sure to review homework and practice exams.  If you understand those problems the test is a breeze.

HARD CLASS!!! If you HAVE to take it though, take it with Jenison. He doesn't make it harder than it has to be, and the final is NOT cumulative!! Tests are relatively hard but homework is pretty easy. His notes are not very well organized but he's a funny guy. Go to class, take good notes and study!
He was not very helpful during lecture.  He does not explain things very well and you have to learn most of it on your own.

Really easy class. He tried to teach it as if it were an english class though, not enough numbers, too many words. Textbook looked like a novel, not a math text. Incredibly easy content though. Never touched the book, but got an A. He likes Phish a lot...
I am so thankful that I took this class with him.  He was very freindly, knew everyone's name, and was very helpful.  I recommend him all of the time to others who have to take a statistics class.
I wasn't thrilled about taking this course, but he is an excellent professor.  Explains things very thoroughly and is available for extra questions.  Highly recommend!!
Kind of boring, but that's probably because he explains things slowly and repeatedly so that everyone understands. So it does make the class easier. Overall good professor.

This is my favorite professor on this campus.  I was not extremly exctied to take this class But Rick took extra time to meet with students outside his office hours and made this class one of the most rewarding I've taken.  He is the only person I would recommend for Psych 210.

this was the hardest class i have ever taken on this campus.  if you are not a math person but still have to take stats for some reason, DO NOT take it with this guy.  he is way too smart for his own good and i understood basically nothing.  nice guy tho.
Kind of boring and slow as a lecturer, but super nice guy. Had dry jokes, but was very open to questions and was patient in explaining concepts multiple times. Not too interesting, though.
